string-array.name: motivation_messages
string-array.item: Good morning my friend. You look awesome today!
Success comes to those who have the willpower to win over their snooze button.
A good day starts with good thoughts!
No one can stop you from doing anything that is on your mind!
It is not just another day, it is yet another chance to make your dreams come true!
If you have not been able to achieve something, today is the best time to start working towards it again!
Imagine all that you will be able to achieve today!
Good morning is a contradiction of terms. Good morning anyway ;)
Good morning, and enjoy your coffee!

resources.string: Well done! You have managed to work on everything you planned for today.
